alert.note: Alert for Sheridan (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 31 at 6:47PM MDT by NWS Glasgow
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Sheridan County through 715 PM MDT... At 646 PM MDT, the public reported a strong thunderstorm near Plentywood, moving north at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Public. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Plentywood, Archer, Port Of Raymond, Outlook, Reserve, Raymond, Daleview and Antelope. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
